issue_description: OpenAI Builder generates patches with literal '...' truncation causing corrupt patches
context: Despite increasing max_tokens to 16384 and fixing file_context structure, OpenAI GPT-4o Builder still generates patches with literal '...' (e.g., '+        self._organize_canada_...'). Token usage is low (747-1506 tokens), so not hitting limits. 2 of 6 phases succeed, 4 fail with corrupt patches. All phases show HTTP 400 Auditor errors and HTTP 500 builder_result POST errors.
error_logs: HTTP 400 Bad Request on Auditor, HTTP 500 Internal Server Error on builder_result POST, error: corrupt patch at line 39/51/55/125
attempted_fixes: Fixed file_context structure mismatch to pass existing_files dict
